caption:
I am currently sitting here trying to wrap my head around what happened the other day. 

We opened the cart for my Inner Circle.

12 minutes later, it was completely booked out. 

All 20 spots were filled SO fast. 

I’ve never made $100k in 12 minutes before and frankly I’m still processing this. 

Here’s one thing that hit me: 

I don’t think 12 minutes was even enough time to read the very long checkout page that had all the program details.

I think 20 students trusted me and my brand so much they were willing to spend $5,000 simply because I said it was going to help them grow their business. 

That is a serious responsibility. 

(My goal is to help them turn that $5,000 they just invested and show them how I make $500,000 a MONTH.)

This launch taught me something huge: 

It taught me that, if you show up and help people for long enough, you will build a truly insane level of trust. 

I’m honored. 

I’m grateful. 

To my 20 new students: I can’t wait to get to know you better & help you scale your business. ✨

P.S. we might be publicly opening up spots in the Inner Circle on May 20th if you tried to get in before and couldn’t!
